Title.Language: Koiahk Melody on the Eighth Part of the Sunday Theotokia
مـديح كيهكي علي القطعة الثامنة من ثيؤطوكية الأحد

Text.Language: Hail to you Mary: I start my praise / Hail to you Mary: Words from my heart / Hail to you Mary: I cry out and say / Hail to you Mary: A rhythmic song
أبدأ فيكِ بمديح / نظم بقلب صحيح / وأشرح فيكِ وأصيح / قول غالي موزون
Hail to you Mary: Every needy one / Hail to you Mary: Rejoices and feels calm / Hail to you Mary: You brought all joy / Hail to you Mary: To every living soul
بمديحك يرتاح / كل ذليل محتاج / يا بدء الأفراح / لكِ عندي عربون
Hail to you Mary: O sweet fruit / Hail to you Mary: Apple of my eye / Hail to you Mary: No one can deny / Hail to you Mary: You are from on high
ثمرة عربوني / هي طب عيوني / في مدحك لاموني / كم عني يقولون
Hail to you Mary: Gabriel came / Hail to you Mary: With tidings from Him / Hail to you Mary: Immanuel became / Hail to you Mary: In your womb a flame
جاءك غبريال / ببشائر وأقوال / وسكن فيكِ المتعال / سر خفي مكنون
Hail to you Mary: The Logos dwelt / Hail to you Mary: Shone with His might / Hail to you Mary: You became heaven / Hail to you Mary: Fruitful and green
حل بكلمته / وأشرق بقدرته / صرتِ كسمائه / يا عوسج بغصون
Hail to you Mary: Savior of the world / Hail to you Mary: Became in your womb / Hail to you Mary: Was born of you / Hail to you Mary: The Holy Spirit in you
مخلص العالم / صارفيك قائم / وإستيقظ النائم / ومخمور بفنون
Hail to you Mary: David in the psalms / Hail to you Mary: Said you are the bride / Hail to you Mary: Offerings and gifts / Hail to you Mary: Was given to the One
داود في المزمور / قال بنات صور / بهدايا ونذور / قالوا فيكِ بفنون
Hail to you Mary: Myriads and myriads / Hail to you Mary: Around the throne stands / Hail to you Mary: Hosts and ranks / Hail to you Mary: Many martyrs
ربوات ثم ألوف / حول العرش وقوف / وطغمات وصفوف / وشهداء متصلون
Hail to you Mary: You are beyond / Hail to you Mary: All types and symbols / Hail to you Mary: Advanced in purity / Hail to you Mary: Was called Zion
زدت في الأوصاف / عن كل الأوصاف / ومشيتى بعفاف / وسُميتِ صهيون
Hail to you Mary: Salome witnessed / Hail to you Mary: That the Virgin bore / Hail to you Mary: The Lord of lords / Hail to you Mary: While her virginity is secure
سالومى شهدت / بأن العذراء وضعت / آمنت وأعتقدت / والخاتم مصون
Hail to you Mary: Isaiah prophesied / Hail to you Mary: That your Son, Jesus / Hail to you Mary: Was born of you / Hail to you Mary: In the fullness of time
أشعياء قال عنكِ / بأن يسوع إبنكِ / وخرج من بطنكِ / ونظرناه بعيون
Hail to you Mary: Solomon proclaimed / Hail to you Mary: That Jesus appeared / Hail to you Mary: As rain and dew / Hail to you Mary: Surrounded by innumerable ranks
صوفونيوس خبَّر / بأن يسوع يظهر / شبه ندي ومطر / حوله صفوف لا يحصون
Hail to you Mary: You are blessed / Hail to you Mary: You marveled them all / Hail to you Mary: By the water and Spirit / Hail to you Mary: We conquered Satan
طوباكِ ثم طوباكِ / حيرتِ العلماء / بوجود الروح والماء / قهرنا الأركون
Hail to you Mary: Many thought of you / Hail to you Mary: This pregnancy was unlawful / Hail to you Mary: Until He came and raised / Hail to you Mary: The dead and healed the sick
ظنوا فيكِ أقوام / بإن الحبل ده حرام / حتى حل وأقام / الأموات والمجنون
Hail to you Mary: O whom the fathers called / Hail to you Mary: A dome and a cloud / Hail to you Mary: O dome of the Church / Hail to you Mary: Your support we search
شبَّهكِ الأباء / قبة وسحابة / ووضعوا بإجابة / وجميعهم فيكِ محتارون
Hail to you Mary: Many came before Him / Hail to you Mary: Praised and did not find Him / Hail to you Mary: Many came after Him / Hail to you Mary: But the Mighty was down
غلب أقوام سبقوه / مدحوا ما لحقوه / جاءوا بعده وجدوه / بسر خفي مكنون
Hail to you Mary: My heart’s rejoice / Hail to you Mary: For you are my choice / Hail to you Mary: O Mary we praise / Hail to you Mary: We cry with voices
فيكِ رضا قلبى / من شأن طلبى / يا مريم حسبي / تاجي وأنا دون
Hail to you Mary: You are Moses’ dome / Hail to you Mary: Ornamented and adorned / Hail to you Mary: In all four corners / Hail to you Mary: With instruments and arts
قبة موسى كان / زخرفها بالألوان / وجعل فيها الأركان / بكل آلة وفنون
Hail to you Mary: God has in the dome / Hail to you Mary: Many prayers and requests / Hail to you Mary: The pot is the sign of love / Hail to you Mary: Were the manna was hidden
لله في القبة / صلوات وطلبة / والقسط علامة المحبة / المن فيه مكنون
Hail to you Mary: A pure censer / Hail to you Mary: Holding the aroma / Hail to you Mary: You are the ark of the covenant / Hail to you Mary: Carrying the True Word
مجمرة التصعيد / زهرة عطر تقيد / يا تابوت عهد جديد / بصفائح وقرون
Hail to you Mary: You carried the Light / Hail to you Mary: Like seven minarets lit / Hail to you Mary: You are Aaron's rod / Hail to you Mary: Which alone blossomed
نالوا نور من نور / سبع سرج ينيرون / وقضيب كان مذخور / بإسم الأب هرون
Hail to you Mary: You are the altar / Hail to you Mary: With incense offered / Hail to you Mary: Many prophesied / Hail to you Mary: Their words were fulfilled
هيكل بموائد / وبخور وصعائد / وآيات وشواهد / عنكِ يتنبأون
Hail to you Mary: All what they said / Hail to you Mary: In the dome they found / Hail to you Mary: As your purity showed / Hail to you Mary: Your virginity is sealed
وجميع ما وضعوه / في القبة وجدوه / ولقدسكِ ذكروه / عذراء بكر مصون
Hail to you Mary: We ask of you / Hail to you Mary: To ask your Son / Hail to you Mary: O blessed Mary / Hail to you Mary: To forgive us
لازم نترجاكِ / عند الإبن عساك / يا مريم طوباكِ / راعينا بعيون
